_header: Lo Carmentis this lady that ye see
_description: Carmentis, Tubal Cain, and Saturnus — three quatrains

TCD432.First Lines:
Lo karmentis þis lady tht ye seffonde furst þe lettirs of
                    oure a.b.c.…
TCD432.Last Lines:
…And for his tylthe was so sweteHe haþe þe name of a
                    stronge planete
TCD432.Editions:
Brotanek,  Rudolph. 
             Mittelenglische Dichtungen aus der Handschrift 432 des Trinity College
                in Dublin.
         Halle: Niemeyer, 1940: 95.
